mapper.select: select tp.id, o.id, tp.team_id, t.team_name, o.is_over, tp.create_time, tp.update_time, tp.core_id from user u, team_okr t, okr_core o, team_personal_okr tp where u.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and u.is_deleted = 0 and t.is_deleted = 0 and o.is_deleted = 0 and tp.is_deleted = 0 and u.id = tp.user_id and tp.core_id = o.id and tp.team_id = t.id order by o.is_over, o.create_time desc

select tp.user_id, tp.create_time, u.nickname, u.email, u.phone, u.photo from team_okr t, team_personal_okr tp, user u where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.is_deleted = 0 and tp.is_deleted = 0 and u.is_deleted = 0 and t.id = tp.team_id and tp.user_id = u.id and u.id != t.manager_id order by tp.create_time desc
